channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Travel Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve found the best travel cameras—from point-and-shoot to full-frame—to help you bring home the perfect vacation photos.

item.title: Harmattan AI raises $200M Series B led by Dassault Aviation, becomes defense unicorn
item.description: French defense tech company Harmattan AI is now valued at $1.4 billion after raising a $200 million Series B round led by Dassault Aviation, which is ...

item.title: Meta hires former Trump advisor Dina Powell McCormick as president and vice chair
item.description: Before joining Meta, Powell McCormick was working as deputy national security advisor to President Donald Trump.

item.title: Anthropic announces Claude for Healthcare following OpenAI’s ChatGPT Health reveal
item.description: Anthropic's Claude for Healthcare is unveiled about a week after OpenAI announced its ChatGPT Health product.

item.title: Pebble founder says his new company is ‘not a startup’
item.description: Pebble's founder talks about how his new company is doing things differently.

item.title: Amazon says 97% of its devices can support Alexa+
item.description: Amazon is counting on its Alexa footprint to help it gain traction in the consumer AI race.

item.title: 10 Best Pet Cameras (2026), Tested With Our Pets
item.description: Whether you’re near or far, keep an eye on your fur baby with our favorite pet cameras.

item.title: Anthropic’s new Cowork tool offers Claude Code without the code
item.description: Built into the Claude Desktop app, Cowork lets users designate a specific folder where Claude can read or modify files, with further instructions give...

item.title: Trump’s EPA plans to ignore health effects of air pollution
item.description: The Trump administration plans to stop assigning value to human life when analyzing the costs and benefits of air pollution controls.

item.title: Luminar lines up $22 million bidder for its lidar business
item.description: The bid comes from Quantum Computing Inc., which already lined up to buy Luminar's semiconductor division. Luminar founder Austin Russell has also exp...
